USA: The Electoral Commission awarded Rutherford B. Hayes the Presidency.
Reconstruction era of the United States: The era ends.
Nez Perce War: The war takes place.
Singapore: The Chinese Protectorate is set up, and William Pickering becomes the head of it.
Serbia: The Russo-Turkish War begins. The majority peoples, the Bosnian Serbs, launch an uprising against the Ottomans in Nevesinje declaring their unification with the Principality of Serbia. Nikola Pašić and Nicholas I of Montenegro proclaim the formal independence of Serbia and Montenegro. The Ottoman Empire declares war on Serbia and Montenegro.
Russia: The Trial of the 193 occurred, punishing the participants of the Narodnik rebellion.
Russo-Turkish War (1877–1878): Russia declared war on the Ottoman Empire.
Philippine: Domingo Moriones y Murillo appointed Governor-General (1877–1880)
Malaysia: Lela Pandak Lam was executed by hanging in Taiping.
